name: So a Detective Walks Into a Bar...
name_original: So a Detective Walks Into a Bar...
description:
You play as a detective trying to solve a murder. Talk to the bar patrons and see what kind of leads you can pick up. After you've gathered all the information you can, enter your guesses into your journal about who you think did it, why they did it, and how!

WASD - Move

E - Talk to characters

F - Advance text

Mouse & Left Click - Make choices

We originally wanted to incorporate the jam's optional limitation of "Nothing is permanent" by making the dialogue only available to the player once. However, this presented programming obstacles we were not able to overcome within the time window. We also had to resort to using pre-made assets for the in-game characters.

Programming - Psalms77 (https://dwwwwwwww.itch.io/)
Writing and Music - Wrenwick (https://wrenwick.itch.io/)
Art - V4LK (https://v4lk-y.itch.io/)

In version 0.4 we fixed the timer display and extend the time to 5mins.
